name: Tokenizer
description: Replaces __<variable>__ with the user-defined variables' values
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: SourcePath
inputs.label: Source filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source file name that contains the tokens (__<variable-name>__). These patterns will be replaced with user-defined variables.

inputs.name: DestinationPath
inputs.label: Destination filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: The destination filename that has tokens replaced by user-defined variables. If this is empty, the 'Source filename' will be modified inline.
